website_summaries.verdict: A large, multi-function European convection oven with a 5 burner stove.
pros: The oven in this range offers an impressive 4 cubic feet of cooking space
It has a black ceramic glass cooktop with 5 sealed elements (one dual center)
The body is stainless steel and the control knobs are chrome, which give the unit a crisp, clean look
cons: Some individuals have noted that the oven in this model takes a bit longer than expected to preheat

customer_reviews.title: safety issue
customer_reviews.text: beautiful stove but major safety issue imo. the vent on the back puts off a ton of heat onto our backsplash and heats up the tile so hot to where i dont see how this isnt dangerous over time. i turn on the exhaust fan above everytime in fear of the stove catching the wall on fire.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Robert from Executive Appliance was great He was in touch and informative throughout the whole purchase and shipping process He really went over and above to ensure I was in the loop at every step and i would highly recommend purchasing from this seller The oven itself is a little flimsy and not exactly what i would have expected for this dollar amount but there really are very limited options for a 36” electric range and overall i am satisfied with the purchase so far
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter McGee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful oven and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful addition to our kitchen. Really a stand out feature. The seller was very helpful in making sure we knew about the product and all it’s features. We live in a remote place and the seller took extra care to make sure we received the oven in a timely manner. They went above and beyond. Excited to bake and cook many meals with this beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Easton

customer_reviews.title: The stove arrived with a non working burner. It ...
customer_reviews.text: The stove arrived with a non working burner. It has yet to be resolved. I've written, called written & called. Still nada.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly mae evans

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oven to fit in the 36" space left behind from removing an old drop in. Best choice ever. It looks beautiful and works wonderfully. Can't wait to get the 2" backsplash to complete the look! Once I'm done refurbishing my cabinets and laying new floor, this oven is going to be the gem of the kitchen. Another note - Robert from Executive Appliance is an absolute gem. So helpful and communicative. I'll be returning to him for other appliance needs in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Best 36 inch electric range for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Italian Made electric range. This is the best one I have ever cooked on. It has five burners that are all different sizes. Looks beautiful. I would definitely recommend it. Best 36” electric range for the $.
customer_reviews.author: Galina German

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STOVE!
customer_reviews.text: beautiful and wonderful stove. Works very well. Customer service was incredible! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Yelena Aliy

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Can not say enough nice things about Mr. Maxwell. He ensured that this product was shipped out the same day when he found that we were a non-profit long term care home. Our Elders are assured a wonderful Thanksgiving feast. I endorse their products and excellent service. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough how much I love this range and how amazing the customer service was working with Executive Appliance. Robert went above and beyond to arrange delivery and make sure we were happy with our purchase. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: White Glove Delivery and Service
customer_reviews.text: The distributor personally contacts you for shipment details and product information. The range is beautiful, so much room inside! I will be purchasing my other appliances through them in the future!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie  hodgins

customer_reviews.title: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL RANGE WE'VE EVER OWNED
customer_reviews.text: Love our new range. It is beautiful and we get so many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura R.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding customer service. Delivery was exceptional. Range looks great, and is functioning perfectly
customer_reviews.author: mike digregorio

customer_reviews.title: Took a Chance
customer_reviews.text: So we just purchased a new house w/o appliances and needed a stove. We took a chance after reading the reviews and decided to go with this appliance. I'm happy we did! This thing has been amazing since installation. Cooks, bakes, broils and you name it. Not to mention it looks great in our new kitchen. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: thomas lane

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: The seller's (Executive Appliance) customer service is outstanding and the Verona Range is everything I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Mary T

customer_reviews.title: Tranquil
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sleek modern and functional oven ever love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mateo Figueroa
